nodes.text: Sordaan Xris' Safari Partners was a big game-hunting excursion company owned and founded by the Rodian Sordaan Xris. It served adventures from all over the galaxy on the planet Kashyyyk, operating out of the Rodian Hunting Grounds.

Sordaan Xris' Safari Partners appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
